1.content: Alright, in order to help sort out the vast number of characters from the X-Universe, let's start by picking the team your character will come from. You can also choose to just do every and any girl from that team once you pick the team.
1.title: Pick Your Team

11.content: Alright, so you're going with the main team in the X-Universe. Who are you going to choose in that series to slob up?
11.title: X-Men

choices: Storm, Emma, and Jean go in for some light training...
Shadowcat, Psycloke, and X-23 train together...
The whole female team train together...
111.content:
Mystique was sweaty, exhausted, but ultimately jubilant as she approached her cohort in her latest endeavor.

Exodus shared Mystique's exhaustion, though he wasn't physically tired but rather mentally drained. He had blocked Frost, the Cuckoo's, and Grey's telepathy, the villain thankful that Xavier had been out of Utopia during this plan concocted by both himself and Mystique.

Mystique had set up the emitters in the Danger Room while Exodus had shielded her from detection, everything coming into place.

Their plan was twofold: to make the X Men females incapable of fighting, thus halving the team's effectiveness, and to humiliate the heroic mutants.

The emitters Mystique had planted would work to change the targets brainwaves, making them hungrier, lazier, and less intelligent overall. The emitters also had the nasty side effect of changing the targets body as well. The victim would find themselves eating more and more, growing fatter at twice their normal rate. Their digestive systems would also be injured, causing them to expel four times the amount of gas even the gassiest human on the planet did on a daily rate.

"They'll train in their little room and totally ruin themselves in the process!" Mystique crowed.

Exodus nodded, joining his compatriot in some evil laughter.

But which X women would try out the now literal Danger Room?
111.title: The entire team

choices: Follow Storm and her group as they pig out.
Follow Emma and her team as they stuff themselves and get gassier.
Follow Jean and her cohorts as they start to sweat and get dumb.
1113.content:
The female members of the X Men all decided to hold a massive training day, followed by a slumber party, something that excited the younger, just turned 18 members of the team, and made the older, more experienced women shake their heads at the thought of all the junk food they'd eat at the event.

But first, the training...

Storm led one group, consisting of herself, Shadowcat, X-23, and Karma.

Emma led another, Rogue, Psylocke, Magick, joining her team.

Jean led the last, getting the rest of the women, including Wolfsbane, Pixie, and Jubilee.

Storm's section of the danger room involved leading her team through a treacherous jungle environment, proving no trouble for the weather controller or her team.

Emma's section involved a hostage situation at a school, again proving no trouble for the mutants.

Jean's section of the room was a massive fight between eight Sentinels but through the combined efforts of the telepath and her team, they were victorious.

An hour later, the whole group of women met up again, each sweating a bit more than usual though they chocked that up to the various obstacles they overcame in their training.

"Good work ladies!" Storm said, Emma just giving a curt nod at her team while Jean offered her own thanks to her team.

Pffffft...

Emma's face turned beet red as a somewhat loud fart eased past her rear, the rest of the mutants knowing who had done it by the look on her face.

"Lay off the beans Emma!" Jean teased, before an even louder fart broke from her butt.

Storm sighed and was about to lecture her fellow leaders when the weather goddess summoned an entirely different kind of wind.

PFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFT!

Now it was Storm's turn to blush.

The other mutants were all laughing at the gas attacks their leaders had when suddenly farts started erupting all over the place, soon joined by another noise.

Their stomachs were rumbling...

"I...don't know about you ladies but...I'm kind of hungry," Jean said.

Emma and Storm along with the rest of the female mutants nodded.

Food sounded good right about now...
1113.title: The whole female team train together...

choices: Next to Storm's group: Sweaty and dirty ladies
Next to Jean's group: Putting on some weight
11132.content:
Rogue, Psylocke and Magik waited patiently inside their dorm room for Emma to bring back the food. They all ordered from the Belly Burger and Emma went to pick up the food. However, they all seemed to be hungrier than usual, as each of them ordered four meals at a time. It had been half an hour and Rogue's stomach grumbled as she read a magazine on her bed.

"God, I'm hungrier than usual today," she groaned, "Usually I just buy a small fries set from that place but I ordered four extra large bacon burgers!"

PHFRRRRTTTT! Magik's gassy fart blasted in the room, which the girls were starting to ignore at this point, as if it had started to become normal for them.

"I ate several bags of chips a couple minutes ago but I'm still starving!" she whined, "Where's Emma already!?"

The door opened as the girls faces lit up. In came Emma, with not just several bags, but five wheeltrays each packed with several dozen bags each on them. Their jaws dropped as Emma walked in, sloppily chowing down on a chickenburger. Crumbs rested on her shirt and her face was messy with the grease.

"Uhhh.... I got kinda excited and ordered about... fifteen meals or so for each of us....." she said.

"Emma! You used my card! This must've costed several hundred dollars!"

Emma just blushed. "URRRRRRRRRRRRRP!" was all she could reply as she dug back into her burger. Rogue licked her lips, suddenly feeling hungrier.

"Oh, forget it, I'm starving, give me my damn food"

All the girls grabbed several bags and chowed down. Rogue went to task on her first gigantic baconburger, filled with three meat patties and three layers of cheese, as she washed it down with a Big Gulp sized coke. The cheese and grease dripped onto her gloves, as she wiped them off onto her legs, ignoring the napkins she had nearby. Before she knew it, she finished one and was already starting on the second. She grabbed some cheesefries as her side dish and started gulping a second cup of Big Gulp. As she finished the second burger and gulped the coke in one breath, she let loose a cannon of a fart as she licked the cheese off her gloves. She grabbed five more bags and dug in again.

Psylocke was on her fifth chicken sandwich at this point. Her face was messy with mayo as she washed it down with a large chocolate milkshake. She shoved some more onion rings into her mouth as she unwrapped a six sandwich. URRRRPPPPPPPPP! Her mouth released some gas before she dug in once again. She didn't toss the trash aside as it all piled into her lap, her legs getting covered in the grease and chicken form the wrappers. A fart rumbled into her bed as she finished the sixth sandwich.

Magik had already eaten her fifteen double burgers at this point. She borrowed a couple chicken burgers from Emma and dug in. She scratched her hair a couple times, accidently greasing it up, but was too busy eating to notice. Her farts got smellier and louder, but at this point, in the commotion of the farts and burps it didn't really matter.

The girls spent over an hour eating away at the food, lost in the daze of their nearly infinite order.
11132.title: Follow Emma and her team as they stuff themselv...

choices: Storm's group keeps sweating it out during their short break.
Next: to Jean's group, getting lazy and dumb.
111321.content:
Mystique was looking over the specifications of the emitters they left in the Danger Room when something peculiar caught her eye. She put in for more detail to confirm it. Sure enough, her first suspicions were accurate.

"What's wrong?" Exodus asked.

To answer him, Mystique zoomed in on the offending wires within the emitters, pointed them out and turned to him.

"We made a slight mistake in the wiring. We set it to make the women fat at twice their normal rate, but we neglected to consider all their other changes. They're hungrier and they eat more, but all the extra food they eat comes out as sweat and gas."

"Skinny slobs? That's a first. What about our other changes?"

"They're holding up well. They always split up into teams that specialized in combat roles, now they'll become specialized slobs!" Mystique had to laugh at the changes the women must be going through already. "They'll all have a little of each other's problems, but when it comes down to it nobody on another team could beat out Emma and her team in gassiness."

"How about Storm and Jean Grey's teams?"


The teams were split up and decided that morning, but the one unusual case was Polaris. Because she just got her powers back and returned to the X-men, Emma, Storm and Jean decided together that Lorna needed triple duty training and bounce around on the teams until she found one where she could fit. For better or worse, this meant she would become a jack of all slobs, and after spending the morning practice session with Jean, she sat down next to Storm.

"I didn't know I was so out of shape until this morning. Maybe I should spend more time in the Danger Room after we're done training," Polaris said.

She raised her arm and scratched the itchy stubble growing under her armpit. Her attention went from Storm to X-23 when she felt the teenage girl's hand grip her arm and felt X-23's nose bury into her sweaty pit.

"You stink," X-23 said matter of factly.

"What did you expect from smelling my armpit after a training session," Polaris answered. "You're no rose yourself, you might want to take a shower and change out of those sweaty clothes."

"I'm going to get sweaty and dirty again anyway, I'll wait until we're done for the day."

"Laura's right, and it appears the training regimen I prepared is a lot harder than I thought. There's no sense in freshening up yet when we have the rest of the day left to go." Storm said this while wiping her forehead. Like any of the team leaders, she was hit the hardest of all with the specialized slob changes. Her white hair stood out like a sore thumb under her armpits, which her teammates shrugged off as Ororo's choice.

Karma took a napkin and slipped it under the collar of her suit to wipe off some of the sweat building on her chest, while X-23 blushed as she tried to secretly scratch her itchy, sweaty crotch.
111321.title: Next to Storm's group: Sweaty and dirty ladies

choices: Jean's group, they're all getting fat and lazy...
1113211.content:
After just ten more minutes of their break, each female mutant was truly sweating up a storm, their BO wrecking havoc on the noses of all of them, even if they didn't have X-23's keen sense of smell.

Storm was aware that something was off but didn't mind the stench or the fact that she was sweating worse than the Blob in the jungle. Her armpit hair had increased in length yet again.

X-23's thighs were now covered in itchy, sweaty hair follicles, her crotch the epicenter of all this hair.

Karma, meanwhile, was itching along her collarbone and butt, tiny hairs making their presence known there.

Polaris looked like she had two bushes smuggled under her armpits.

Mystique, watching from her hidden lair with Exodus, laughed.

"And they're still going to get fat and gassy! Oh this is the best revenge we could have ever come up with!"

Exodus, while not as enamored with the results as Mystique was, still found the sight amusing.

Returning their attention to the monitors, they focused on...
1113211.title: Storm's group keeps sweating it out during ...

choices: Go back to Storm or Emma's teams and check in
Another group of students and members go in for some training to the Danger Room
11132111.content:
Meanwhile in Jean's quarters, her team was busy getting ready for the big slumber party that was to be held that night, although it was going to be a tad bigger than previously intended at this point. Jean sat on her bed, her costume now clinging to her body that had grown by almost one hundred pounds and was so sweaty the stains could be seen through the material. Pixie made her way into the room after changing into a pair of pajama pants that used to be big on her but now the elastic was expanding to its limits and the tank top now exposed her round growing stomach. "Awww, Ms Grey shouldn't you have changed already? The slumber party is *FRAP* just moments away," she said as her pajama pants fluttered in her own wind.

"Huh, oh right," said Jean as she wheezed and reached to her side and grabbed a bowl of potato chips, she lifted it to her face and started shoving her head right into the bowl and chewing on it all until it was gone. When she lifted her head back out her face was covered in grease and it could even be seen in her hair. "But... I forgot where my pajamas are. Can't I just go in my underwear?"

"Oooh, you're so smart Jean," said Jubilee who was lazing on the floor, propping herself up against the wall, her raincoat taken off to make space as her breast tried to contain themselves in her top and her pants unbuttoned and about to be ripped through by her fat legs. "My legs don't feel good trapped inside these pants," she said as she rolled onto her back and lifted her fat cankle forming feet into the air. "Pixie could you hewp me take them off, this zipper must be stuck or something."

Pixie examined Jubilee's pants and remarked, "Um, they're already all the way down."

"Oh, uh, sorry about that," said Jubilee blushing, "I guess I forgot." Jubilee used to always feel like the dumbest member of the team back when she was a rookie, and that feeling came back quickly, only to be replaced by a bubbly happiness as she laughed it off.

"See, that's why I'm happy just staying in my wolf form," said Wolfsbane as she crawled into the room in just her tight fitting underwear that was drenched with stains and sweat. "I don't have to worry about zippers or such."

"But, um, Rahne, you're still in human form," corrected Pixe.

"Oh I am," she asked in a confused Irish accent. She began grunting and straining until *FRRRRPPPP* "How about now?"

"No, that was just a fart, *wheeze* still human," commented Jubilee.

"Aww, now I have to start walking on two legs again," said Wolfsbane, more embarrased at that than the fart.

"Hmm, something seems up with these girls," thought Pixie, "they seem.... smarter," she thought as she started picking her own nose. She stopped to let out a fart and giggle over it.

"Alright," wheezed Jean as she sat up, her fat finally tearing a rip through the back of her costume, "we should get ready. We need to go to the slumber party with.... um.... Nice Lady and Meanie Pants."
11132111.title: Jean's group, they're all getting fat a...

choices: Storm becomes aware of how fat, sweaty, and gassy she's gotten!
111321111.content:
Emma's team was the closest to actually being ready for the sleepover, but they had a problem.

Their clothes no longer fit.

Emma, being the leader of the team, had been hit the worst with the emitter ray and as such had gained the most weight out of her team as well as being the most gassy.

"URRRRRRP! I think...that something's a bit...off..." she said.

All of the food had been eaten and was either in their stomachs or splattered over the remains of their clothes.

"Nah, we're fine!" Rogue insisted with an equally loud belch.

Psylocke let loose a loud fart, causing Magik to clap at it's volume.

"Really?" Emma said. Her mind was a bit fuzzy as the dumbing down part of the slob program was playing havoc in her head.

The other mutant ladies nodded.

"Alright, if you say so." Emma then farted for twenty seconds and got to her feet, her gut nearly touching the floor despite her standing position.

Mystique chuckled at the sight of Emma, Rogue, and Psylocke waddling into the Mansion proper, heading for Jean's room where the slumber party would take place.

"Can we make them aware of the changes at all?" Exodus asked.

"There will be moments where they are aware, but it will be quickly buried under the need to eat, fart, burp, or laziness," Mystique replied.

Exodus nodded his understanding and resumed watching the monitors.
111321111.title: Go back to Storm or Emma's teams and check in

choices: The Slumber Party starts and they were able to find pajamas big enough for them
The party starts and they are too fat for their PJs so they have to improvise
1113211112.content:
Mystique was right, the girls were occasionally having moments where they'd think something was wrong, but it wouldn't last long. Most of the time it would be a quick need to say "excuse me" or a blush at a fart, or quick nervousness over the pudge forming around their stomach. But after a few minutes the feeling would wear off and they'd be shoving their faces back into the food they had gathered around them. In fact at that moment one of them was going to get fairly close to breaking the effects of the spell.

Storm was struggling to tug off the leather leather one piece that made up her uniform, normally she could slip it off just fine but her extra one hundred pounds had strained it so much the leather could visibly be seen stretching and changing color. "By the *Hnnnng* Goddess," she uttered as she tried to pull the costume down, "when did this become so tight. The costume was so tight that she tried to fart but a muffle came out as her butt cheeks could barely spread out enough for it. She had begun working up a sweat, even more than before, and this went to helping her squeeze the costume down, it sliding slowly down her flabby roles until it dropped to the ground like a bag of groceries.

Storm let out a sigh and fart of relief. There was a knock on the bathroom door. "Miss Storm are you alright?" asked Karma.

"Much much better now child *FRRRRRT* I feel brand new after that." She scratched her rump with such vigor that her cheek flapped up and down making a small smacking sound. It was then that she couldn't help but notice how stretched out her costume was. She began scratching the stubble under her sweaty pits when she turned towards the mirror in the bathroom and saw her bronze skin now in folds and building up all over her body. Her massive breast flopped around freely and were covered in grease and sweat. Her stomach had a muffin top so large it drooped down to the point where her panties couldn't even be seen. And her fat leg's rubbed together no matter how far she spread them apart.

"What... what has become of me!?" she shrieked as she fell backwards and landed on her massive rump. She blushed so hard she could feel her temperature rising. Almost in response her farts started spilling out of her uncontrollably and she tried to clench her cheeks shut, but it just caused her to start burping loudly.

"Teacheeeeeer," whined X-23, "the rest of us need to change too."

"Oh we could eat while she's taking so long," suggested Kitty Pryde.

"Oh good idea," said Karma as she released a fart so loud even Storm could hear it.

Storm stood up and started pacing back and forth, feeling her fat flapping up and down and jiggling uncontrollably. "What has happened to me, to us? We're like a pack of animals now, who could have done this?"

Exodus watched this and commented, "I think we may have been found out."

"Not yet, just wait," said Mystique.

In the bathroom Storm sat on the floor, the goddess's spirit completely broken now as she just breathed heavily. However her embarrassment began to subside as it was replaced by a hunger building up inside of her. "Ooooh, why did I have to come in here on an empty stomach without supplies." She tried to fight it but the feeling got the better of her. She cracked open the door and peaked out and saw Karma laying back and shoving miniature hot dogs into her gapping mouth, causing her fat to expand enough to begin shredding her costume. Kitty Pryde had taken out a liter bottle of soda and was chugging it down, only to take it away from her lips and let out a massive belch. And X-23 had scewered several donuts which whe was eating off her claws, her giant belly and large breast now pushing her tank top to its limits.

"What is wrong with them, don't they see this," wondered Storm as she looked around the room. She stopped when she saw a large bowl of chips that were overflowing, the mere sight of which almost caused her to start drooling. "I... I just need to reach that bowl without them seeing me." She slowly opened the door and started crawling across the floor, her massive breast and flabby stomach hanging down like udders on the cow she had been turned into. She finally reached the bowl and didn't even think to grab it, instead she just dove her head strait in and began chewing away like a pig at a trough.

"Awww *URP* Ororo if you were done you should have told us, we need to change too," said Kitty as she scratched under her armpit.

"Terribly sorry," she said lifting her head out of the bowl and letting a wet fart escape her rump, almost ruining the last shred of clothes on her, "I just... I just got so hungry," she said as she shoved her head back into the bowl, all her worries now gone and once again returned to the lazy piggish slob she had become.

"No problem," said Karma, "but we need to get changed soon, the slumber party is about to begin."
1113211112.title: Storm becomes aware of how fat, sweaty, and gas...

11132111122.content:
Storm, Kitty, Karma, X-23, and the rest of the mutants in Storm's group had made it to the party.

Of course, each was bulging with too much blubber to be contained by any pajamas they had on hand, so the slobby mutants improvised.

Storm wore the tattered remains of her shirt as a huge bra, all the material that once safely contained and showed off her midriff now just enough to cover her breasts. Her pants were ripped in various places but luckily Storm was able to sew some curtains into the fabric and increase the size of the fabric, now easily covering her huge rump. Of course her clothes were covered in salt and grease from all the food she had eaten but she didn't care.

Kitty, on the other hand, was in her panties and bra, both stretched to their limits, Shadowcat's huge gut covering her crotch area, sweat glistening all over her.

Karma, who had been fat once before but highly aware of it, was now just as huge. Of course she didn't care as much now as she did then and actually liked her fat, at least her slob-programmed brain did. She was dressed in queen sized bed sheets.

X-23, whose butt, thighs, and belly were the largest out of Storm's team, save for the leader's huge proportions, was dressed in a modified version of her skintight leather X Man uniform. Her chubby cheeks were rimmed with powder from the donuts she had managed to find almost instantly, the food set out on a long table. Of course there was enough to feed the entire school twice over, the refreshments about the only thing cleanly looking about the slumber party.

Kitty and Karma started dancing as Storm started the music, the weather mutant waddling over to X-23 as Laura ripped a loud fart in her direction.

Laura's keen sense of smell detected just how rancid it is but she could only muster up a momentary blush as she turned around. But instead of scolding her as she would have in her normal state of mind, Storm instead patted X-23's beer gut, causing the clone to belch soon afterwards.

"Nice one! URRRRRRRP!" Storm replied.

X-23 laughed and then decided to dance, Storm soon joining in, each slobby mutant's fat, sweaty, bodies jiggling to and fro as they moved to the beat.
11132111122.title: The party starts and they are too fat for their...

111321111222.content:
"Hiyah, girls," Jean grinned as she waddled into the room, her massive bulk naked except for a bra and some panties that were devoured by her butt-cheeks.

She was followed by the rest of her team. For some reason, their intelligence had been dropping more quickly than the other teams. Even Jean now how a hard time remembering basic arithmatic.

"Mmmm, looks yummy!"

Jean grabbed a whole leg of lamb and then shuffled on to the dance floor, jiggling her massive belly against Storm's as she chewed the meat with one hand and danced to the beat.
111321111222.title: Jean's team arrives next.

1113211112221.content:
Emma's team shows-up as everyone was now accounted for. The party was really going as someone was watching from a distance.

A 10 year old boy named DJ was watching the party from a tree with binoculars. "Wow." DJ said to himself.

The party was going fine but Storm was felt like she was being watched.

"I'll be right back ladies." Storm said as she went outside. She saw the person who was watching but decided to surprise him as she conjured up quick lightning and thunder. DJ heard the sudden storm he fell from the tree. Before he fell on his face, Storm grabbed him. "Storm?" DJ asked.

"You shouldn't have spied on us kid!" Storm said as she took him into the mansion.
1113211112221.title: Storm catches a peeper!

choices: They Play Dumb & Don't Believe Him
11132111122211.content:
Storm came back with the small intruder. "Who are you?" Rouge asked.

"The name's DJ." He answered.

"I saw this kid looking at us partying up on a tree. I think we should punish him!" Storm said to the others.

The others agreed while Jean asked, "Are you a spy or something?"

"No, I swear that I'm no a spy! I just was looking at all of you beautiful girls dancing that's all!" DJ said.

"Even when were sweating and farting like fat slobs?" X-23 asked.

"That doesn't matter to me that much." DJ replied.

All or the girls blushed when he said that. "Well what should we do with him Storm?" Jean asked.

Storm said..
11132111122211.title: DJ Explains himself

choices: Emma gets to the ketchn and eats like crazy
Starts developing bad gas and likes it.
113.content:
Emma Frost the former White Queen of the infamous Hellfire Club, emerged from her bed she noticed that something felt wrong but she couldn't put her finger on it. She headed to the shower and took a quick shower, as she was in the shower she noticed that the water didn't smell right. She got out of the shower and wondered why things seemed so odd. She re-entered her bedroom and got dressed.

Emma looked at herself in the large full length mirror. She truly loved what she saw, her long well groomed blonde hair, her perfect body with that was the best money could but. She loved her reflection and the way her perfect body looked in her white leather outfit.

As she made her way into the hall way Emma started to feel an odd pressure in her stomach, she knew that she had not eaten yet, but she had never had this kind of feeling before. Of of the sudden a loud fart came from Emma's backside, she stood straight up looking around to make sure that no one was around and then said to herself "I don't know what that was all about Emma darling, but it had better be the last time."


She then began her way towards the kitchen.
113.title: Emma Frost

choices: Was horrified at what she saw
Found it very relaxing and relieving
1131.content:
Luckily no one was in the kitchen either, it was a nice little break for her and she took her time sitting down and relaxing, although making sure not to relax too much for fear of letting out another toot. "What would hit the spot right now," she thought as she rested her chin on her hand as she looked at the refrigerator. She suddenly got a strange hankering and decided "Why do I have to choose?"

She opened the refrigerator and found half a birthday cake from a party yesterday still sitting there. She didn't even stop to think about it as she took the entire thing out and placed it on the table. But this wasn't enough for her, she got a hankering for ham, and turkey, and mustard and relish and all sorts of other toppings. She kept grabbing items and didn't even notice that while her hands were busy grabbing food her mouth had a bottle of soda in it and she was attempting to chug it without the use of her fingers. Finally she got everything on the table and looked at it all and though, "Well... I'll just pick and choose little bits of it until I'm full."

She acted very pretentious and important, as she always does, as she reached down and took a bit of the cake on her finger and licked it off. The moment the frosting hit her lips she was gone, lost in a pleasant fantasy about food. She dug her hands into the cake and started slathering it across her face, chewing it down as frosting covered her cheeks, clumps of it falling to the ground. She kept reaching for one handfull of cake after another with one arm while the other reached over and grabbed slabs of ham and dunked them in mustard and started shoving them into his mouth, many times at the same moment as the cake.

She felt her skintight pants start to tear as her butt began to expand. Her breast slowly grew larger until a tear started to form up her back. She kept eating and eating, cake covering her ever rounding cheeks as she snorted like the pig she was acting like, and she continued until she finally finished off all the food she had gathered. She layed back and patted her stomach, which sounded like a ripe watermelon and looked like an inflated beach ball it was so rounded with fat. The moment she slapped it a jiggle went across her fat and it caused her pants and top to burst off in one moment. She was left there in just her extremely tight bra and panties as she-
1131.title: Emma gets to the ketchn and eats like crazy

115.content: Who are some other choices you'd want to see?
115.title: X-Men More

choices: Storm tries to get to her but Rogue stuffs her face.
Storm reports back to Cyclops, who has Wolverine try to talk to Rogue.
1152.content:
Kurt's death had shattered Rogue.

Though she eventually succeeded in saving Hope, who in turn saved the mutant race, once her mission was done, Rogue retreated from her duties as an X Man, holing up in some out of the way diner and eating copious amounts of food to try and forget about her half-brother and her loss.

Four months later...

Storm entered the diner, just to rest, for she was sure she was no closer to finding Rogue than she had been ever since Cyclops had sent some of the X Men out to look for her.

Ordering some food, Storm sighed as she thought of her former teammate and friend, wondering where she was.

A loud belch to her right cut off her thoughts and as she turned to reprimand whoever had been so rude, she was shocked to see that familiar white/brown hair.

It was Rogue...but a changed Rogue.

The formerly untouchable mutant was now hugely obese, looking like she weighed around two hundred and seventy pounds, most of it in her huge rear, her belly taking the rest of the weight, the cream-white gut unable to be covered by her food stained shirt.

"Rogue?!"

The woman didn't turn. Storm finally got up and walked over, touching her on the shoulder.

That got her attention.

"Ororo...URRRRRP...leave me alone..." Rogue farted then, the stench causing Ororo to summon some wind to blow it away.

"Rogue...who've got to come back to us."

Rogue's response was another fart.
1152.title: Rogue

choices: 300 pounds...Jean wants to be bigger and she wants Storm to join her!
250 pounds...Jean is dissapointed and asks Scott to feed her.
11531.content:
"Scott..."

Cyclops opened his eyes, his visor still in place even as he slept, and took in Jean's body, as familiar as ever.

They were married again, after Jean's return, Scott letting Emma down as gently as he could. Jean, for her part, forgave Scott, knowing how much strain the Phoenix had put on their relationship. But with the entity gone and Utopia at peace, Scott and Jean could finally settle down and enjoy life as a couple.

"What is it Jean?"

"I'm done fighting. From now on I'm just going to relax, with you, alright?"

"Of course, whatever you want."

Jean smiled and kissed him.

Little did Scott know that that was the start of everything...

Jean ate with gusto the next day, chowing down on several plates piled high with pancakes. After she was done, she rubbed her stuffed stomach and gave a mighty belch, not apologizing at all.

And as the weeks turned to months, Jean's body filled out. Her breasts increasing, her toned stomach becoming a huge gut, and her rear expanding beyond belief. Scott was worried about Jean's health but after a checkup by Hank, showing a clean bill of health, he relented and watched as Jean grew ever more large and her manners vanished.

Which led him to today.

Jean welcomed the morning with a huge blast of flatulence from her rear, padding her way to the bathroom and getting on the scale, the digital numbers flashing...
11531.title: Jean it is!

choices: Over the next month Laura and her friends go back to the bar, getting fatter.
Skip ahead a few months to a slobby Laura and friends.
115321.content:
X-23, or Laura, as she preferred to be called when the team wasn't on missions, winced as the smell of the bar's patrons came to her highly sensitive nose.

"And this is supposed to be fun?" she remarked to her companions, the mutants Shadowcat and Wolfsbane.

"Of course!" Kitty replied. "You just need to have something to drink!"

Wolfsbane nodded in agreement. Sighing, Laura went along with her friends, the trio grabbing some bar stools and ordering some drinks. Laura was a bit hesitant as to what to get at first but Kitty and Wolfsbane gave her some suggestions.

When Laura's beer arrived it was massive. White foam at the top, the liquid almost golden in the light, something within Laura seemed to be drawn to that beer. Picking it up, she started chugging it down and after a minute all of that liquid was in Laura's stomach.

Placing the glass on the counter, she asked for another.

GULP...GULP...GULP.

Beer after beer went down Laura's throat, her belly expanding with each one as her healing factor wasn't able to keep up with how much alcohol she was consuming.

Kitty and Wolfsbane both laughed as Laura belched loudly but were soon belching as well as Laura dared them to match her drink for drink.

At the end of the night the three bloated mutants went out of the bar, the only one sober being X-23, as her healing factor prevented her from getting drunk. Though her belly was still crammed with beer. Poking the stuffed gut she now had, Laura was surprised at how good it felt...
115321.title: Logan's clone it is!

choices: She tries out a new beer (gets gassier)
She starts ordering delivery (gets lazy and bad manners)
1153211.content:
Laura and her friends started enjoying going to the bar. A lot.

The next weekend they came back and had even more beers than last time. X-23 had over 20 beers, being able to handle them without getting drunk. By the end of the night she couldn't finish a sentence without burping loudly. Kitty and Wolfsbane both got drunk and passed out, leaving Laura to carry them home. Laura laid in bed that night, rubbing her chubby belly and enjoying the feeling of being stuffed by the alcohol.

But then it turned into a nightly ordeal. They went back the next night, and before they knew it, they went back every night for the next week. More beer had been consumed, Laura ordering more than the previous night and drinking from larger glasses. Not only that, but they also discovered the bar's dinner menu, leading Laura to start chowing down on burgers and chicken as she drank more beer.

Then one morning, as Laura laid in bed rubbing her big belly yet again, a chubbier Kitty ran in to tell her that the bar was now serving earlier! Laura got excited as they immediately went and spent the day eating more from the menu and guzzling down dozens of beers. Then they went the next day. And the next.

The month had past, and the three girls had spent the entirety of the past three weeks at the bar. They were starting to turn into favorites of the owners. Kitty and Wolfsbane were getting a bit chubby, sure, but Laura had bloated the most. Now at 220 pounds, the big clone was enjoying her new world of pigging out at the bar.

Of course, it wasn't the only change in store for her...
1153211.title: Over the next month Laura and her friends go ba...

choices: The girls grab Wolfsbane and head off to the bar!
Wolfsbane, startled at her own weight,  tries to convince the girls to exercise!
11532112.content:
Laura was aware of the bar's delivery menu the day it was released. While she had earned her share of friends since her time with the X-Men, part of her was still the girl raised in near-isolation inside a laboratory base. Being able to snack on the bar's famous beer-battered chicken wings and towering burgers made a quiet day away from the bustle of the outside world even better for Laura. Wolfsbane was no more extroverted than Laura, so Rahne quickly fell into line with placing massive delivery requests. Kitty, more than happy to spend the day on a computer, reading a book, or playing some video games, saw no logical flaw in the waves of greasy food showing up at the Xavier institute.

It wasn't long before Laura took to ordering beers. What started with a six-pack soon became stacks of cans, to the point where a sea of aluminum would surround X-23 by the time she was ready to retire to her room from one of the den couches. Lazing around, she began to find time moving much faster than usual; she could burn a whole day watching movies while slurping up dripping cheese and gushing streams of beer. She often took to wearing shirts that she had outgrown long ago, leaving her soft, widening gut hanging out. She could often be seen resting one hand on it contentedly as it filled with yet more sustenance. Laura's ass had swollen to take up nearly two couch cushions, and her belly was just wide enough to keep up with her waist. Her chest was certainly getting weightier, and her face had settled into an extra chin. Laura took note that her body was starting to rankle at her diet; the constant stream of junk food and frothy beer had given her an omnipresent case of gas, and Laura found herself plagued with stomach cramps that even her regenerative abilities couldn't alleviate. Rahne, possessing a canine sense of smell, always seemed to wrinkle her nose around Laura, occasionally remarking that she was developing worse manners than Wolverine.

This went on for some time, until Laura began to re-prioritize. She was going through beer faster than it could be delivered. Bending around the couch to grab fresh bags from the sea of trash around her was starting to make her break a sweat, and she certainly didn't have the energy to be showering all the time, not with so much food to be eaten!

"Kitty? You in there?" Shadowcat was sitting at her computer, stripping a chicken wing clean. Laura noticed her friend's arms were much plumper than a few months ago, and that she was wearing jeans that were missing their button, allowing a handful of pale flesh to poke through from under her just-too-tight tank top. "I was thinking we could head back to the bar at night...just because we're ordering delivery all day doesn't mean we can't go out, y'know?" Shadowcat turned, licking some sauce off her lips. "Sure, though you're going out in that?" Laura's skin-tight black pants had split at either thigh, and her stomach lolled out over her waistband. "Well..I haven't been out much..." Laura examined herself, trying to pretend that the state of her clothes was due to her ignorance rather than her refusal to waste energy dragging herself to go clothes shopping. Kitty got out of her chair and gestured to her hips, where most of her 90 pound gain had fallen. Laura saw that while Kitty's jeans were tight enough to mold her sides into generous lovehandles, they were certainly much bigger than her old ones.
Laura raised an eyebrow. "When did you go clothes shopping?" Kitty smiled. "I just ordered some stuff online!" Laura tried not to blush; even spending 10 minutes online shopping seemed like a chore to her. "Well, just throw on some sweatpants for tonight or something, I'll order some better-fitting clothes for you. It'll be good to go out again; I'll tell you this stuff is greasy! Maybe we'll lose a few pounds walking to the bar..." Kitty's eyes widened as a fart escaped her rear end, splitting her jeans down the middle. Laura noticed her friend's panties were bunched up to a thong-like position due to their lack of a size update. Laura smiled. "I kind of doubt that, but maybe we'll air ourselves out a little!" Laura put a hand on her hips and let out a fart that she was planning on releasing silently in front of her friend until the recent turn of events. Kitty tried her best not to giggle, but failed. Laura raised an eyebrow thoughtfully. "I wonder if all this food is hitting Rahne as hard as us...I kind of hope so, because -burrrrap!- trying to be sneaky about this is going to be trouble!"
"No kidding." Kitty sighed, fanning her hand by her backside, cocking her head to one side.
11532112.title: She starts ordering delivery (gets lazy and bad...

choices: The girls head to the bar!
The girls go clothes shopping first.
115321122.content:
Rahne, though she had been eating as compulsively as Laura and Kitty, was not enthused when she learned they would be adding even more food to their diets. "Y'know, I've eaten like a starved wolf before, and I think we're outdoing a pack of them with how much we've been stuffing ourselves..." Rahne's shoulder - length red hair framed her pudgy face, which was getting rounder by the day. Her upper body was getting the worst of her weight gain, her breasts already nearing D-cups and her belly wrapped in a too-tight t-shirt, hanging like a small sack of feed over her waistband. Shorter than her friends by over half a foot, Rahne's generous cleavage was perpetually on display for her friends. Kitty noticed that there was no excess flesh popping out of her clothes, indicating that Rahne had probably been the most conscious of how rapidly they were fattening up.

"So you're saying you don't want to come with?" Laura raised an eyebrow. Rahne licked her lips. "Well...lets not be hasty! Why don't we just try and get a little exercise first?"
Rahne decided jogging was out when her breasts nearly bounced out of her shirt before she hit the front door.
----
Kitty shook her head. "If I do squats I'm splitting these exercise shorts."
---
After her first situp, Laura began extending her claws, using their force to push her body up rather than her muscles, letting a fart rip with each thrust. Still, she was winded after her fourth, and her belly barely made it possible anyway!
---
Rahne pinched her nose. "Laura, could you cut it out with the gas? I can't spot you like this, I'll faint!" Kitty raised her hand. "I'll take over, you get used to it after a while, Rahne!" Laura shook her head. "More? Next you'll be suggesting I use weights rather than these tubs of ice cream!" Rahne's eyes widened. "When the hell did you switch those out with the dumbells?! My eyes were watering, I've been half-blind!"
---
"I don't really have an excuse for skipping soccer...I'm just a computer nerd." Kitty gave Rahne her best smile as she kicked the soccer ball away, sending a ripple through her thigh-fat.
--


"So, we've been at it for two hours Rahne and we've gotten-"
"Sweaty and bad case of indigestion from all of those power bars." Rahne let out a small belch.
"Amen." Laura replied.
"Well, we should hop in the shower then get going to the bar..." Kitty started to turn back towards the mansion, her ass shifting up and down through tight-fitting black exercise shorts.
Laura lifted up her arm and sniffed her armpit. Laura noted she definitely was starting to get a little ripe. "We're not -that- bad!" She put her fist over her mouth to cover a particularly voluminous belch.
Rahne pinched her stomach fat. "We stink enough already. I doubt anyone will notice a little post-exercise funk....geeze...my stomach is killing me! I was dumb for trying to run with a stomach full of fried food..."
115321122.title: Wolfsbane, startled at her own weight,  tries t...

choices: The girls get to the bar and find out it's holding a special feast
The girls find out the bar is closed!
1153211222.content:
After their showers, the girls had a bit of trouble. Fitting into their clothes was becoming a bit harder than usual. Laura ripped two pairs of pants wide open trying to fit into them. Kitty went through several dozen shirts, trying to find one that stretched past her large belly. It took Rahne fifteen minutes just to fit into a bra that didn't snap open. Frustrated, Rahne demanded that they were getting new clothes before getting food. Laura and Kitty tried to convince her otherwise, but her fiery eyes caused them to back off and go with Rahne to the mall before going back to the bar.

All of them too tired to even consider walking, Rahne brought her car out as they squeezed inside and drove off. Laura let loose a fart in the backseat as she sighed, rubbing her belly.

"Mannn, I haven't had anything to eat in over twenty minutes!" she groaned, "I'm gonna starve to death!"

"Get over it, Laura," Rahne said as her fat stomach pushed against the wheel, "We're just gonna grab some better clothes to slip in for our new bodies at the moment. We won't be in there for longer than ten minutes, max"

She pulled in to the parking garage and they got out. Kitty released a burp that echoed through the building, causing her and Laura to snicker. The three girls walked inside to the giant clothes store as they made their way to the women's section. They each grabbed some larger clothes and went to try them out in the dressing rooms. However, each one of them had trouble putting on clothes that were even larger!

"This isn't going well," Laura sighed as she stepped out, "I just tried several sizes larger and they still barely fit"

Kitty and Rahne both stepped out, disappointment seeping in on their faces. An employee saw their faces.

"Is anything wrong, ladies?" she asked.

"We're all too fat for these clothes!" Kitty whined with a fart.

"You know, this might be the wrong store for you three," the woman replied, "A new store called Wide Women just opened the other day that has much larger sizes than we offer. You can find it at the other end of the mall"

The three walked off and found the new store called Wide Women. Inside, they were all happy as they found plenty of clothes that fit them perfectly. Laura found a shirt that covered up her stomach perfectly, even if the shirt was large enough to cover her entire previous body. Rahne found a variety of bras that didn't lose support. Kitty was happy to find some pants that were snug enough to fit her big ass. The girls bought a couple bags of clothes each, changed into them in the changing rooms, and walked out happy in their new attires. Laura thought she looked cute especially in her shirt with a pig eating in a trough on the front.

Of course, the girls couldn't help but stop by the food plaza on their way out. The three of them sat in the car as Rahne drove to the bar, Kitty eating a bag full of chicken legs and Laura finishing her third baconburger during the drive.

"URRRRRRP!" Laura greedily burped as grease dripped onto her shirt, "That was a great idea Rahne! With these new clothes and a quick snack we're ready for more food!"
1153211222.title: The girls go clothes shopping first.

choices: Laura downs the entire basin by herself!
11532112222.content:
The girls piled out of the car, repositioning their new clothing to cope with their standing positions. Laura eagerly waddled up the front doors of the bar, when she stopped short. Laura felt Rahne's chest briefly press against her back as she almost bumped into her. Laura balled her hands into fists. "Closed, owners on vacation for the weekend?!" Kitty could hear the loud growls emanating from Laura stomach....and Laura herself. "Woah, Laura, bad idea!" X-23 had released her claws, and was clearly making to tear the front doors of the bar open to gain entry. Kitty sunk her hand into Laura's soft forearm just in time. Laura wheeled to look at her friend. "Are you suggesting we go to bed hungry tonight?" Kitty smiled and puffed a little belch into her friend's scowl. "No way, I'm starving." Kitty sauntered through her friend and continued to phase through the front door of the bar. She then simply undid the lock from the inside. "...Oh." Laura mumbled, kicking herself for her obvious oversight.

Laura went straight for the beer tap. After setting up a few stools, Laura positioned herself under one of the taps (her belly was being stabbed by other taps because it bulged out so much, but oh well!) and depressed the lever. Laura's eyes almost rolled up into her head with pleasure; a constant stream of delicious, calorie-laden beer, never stopping unless she wanted!

Meanwhile, Rhane had fired up the fat frier. She indulged in a long, drawn out fart as she began to smell the chicken and ribs beginning to fry. Rahne glanced at Kitty, hoping she didn't gross her friend out. Kitty gave her a little nod of approval and licked her lips, also half-hypnotized by the smell of cooking meat. "I'll fire up the grill!" Kitty declared, figuring that just food from the frier wouldn't cut it. Rhane grinned, an animalistic hunger flashing in her eyes. "When the burgers and hot dogs are done grilling, throw 'em in the frier." Kitty's eyes widened as he imagined the taste, then darted to work.

Laura had swallowed about 8 liters of beer when she took her first break. Heaving herself off the stool, she felt the slightest buzz coupled with fierce gas. With no one around to judge her, the raven-haired beauty began letting out extremely throaty, deep belches that sounded like an air-horn going off inside a bullfrog. She contentedly peeked inside the kitchen to see her friends heaping dozens of hot dogs, chicken wings, ribs, and burgers onto multiple plates, occasionally grabbing one and stuffing their faces with it. Rhane had developed serious pit stains from working the frier, and Kitty's chin was literally dripping with oil from their unhealthy concoctions. "Hey, save some for me!" Laura exclaimed, startling the girls with another belch. As the girls tore into their meal, they began to tire of just fried meat. "Fried Oreo time!" Kitty cheered, and poured sleeve after sleeve into the fat frier, which was at this point positively shining with fatty residue.

Washed down with generous amounts of beer, the feast went quickly, and the final course of double-fried foods seemed to go the fastest. By the end, all three girls were unabashedly flatulent, unable to keep even the slightest pretense of politeness. Laura rubbed her stomach contentedly. "Let's stop in for breakfast, we'll buy a few hundred eggs and like a sixty pounds of bacon, get the friar going again." Kitty and Rahne made sympathetic groans of hunger at the thought. Rhane perked up slightly. -Burrrap- "Laura, what are you looking at?" X-23 was staring at the fat frier. "Oooh....the grease is cooling...." like a girl possessed, she rose to her feet and stumbled towards the metal bin. Rhane gasped. "Laura, no way!" She had stuck her face into the cooling grease, and had begun to slurp up the basin.
11532112222.title: The girls find out the bar is closed!

choices: The girls run out of grease the next day and get some more
115321122221.content:
Kitty and Rhane looked on in awe as Laura was face-first into the cooled grease, drinking it up like a horse at a river. They could hear her gulping at the thick liquid. Some of her hair got into the grease and was wet with the substance. She stood up to take a breath after several gulps, savoring the taste and licking her lips. The top of her piggy shirt was stained with grease, and some of it dripped off her lips.

"Wow, Laura!" exclaimed Kitty, "Why did you do that?"

PHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHFRT! Laura's gas was smellier now as she stroked her greasy hair.

"I dunno, I just thought it looked really good and dove right in!" she said, "It tastes sooooooo good! It's like a meaty drink!"

"Wow," uttered Rhane, still a bit blown away by what just happened, "Are you kidding with us Laura? No way is that healthy...."

Laura just rolled her eyes.

"Are you STILL going on about that girls? Come on, look at us. We're not exactly striking models anymore"

The other girls looked down at their big, dirty shirts and messy bodies. They definitely felt like they changed a lot this past month, almost unrecognizable from their old selves.

"Maybe it isn't healthy! So what! I'm tired of people telling me what's good and what's not for my body. If I can absorb alcohol with no problem, then why not grease?"

She stuck her head back in and went back to feeding off the grease. Kitty and Rhane looked on for a moment.

"...You know, maybe it's not too bad?" Rhane said, "It doesn't hurt to try something once"

"Mmmm, yeah, it does smell pretty good right now....." said Kitty.

The two girls cautiously walked next to Laura as each one slowly put their faces in. They felt the grease mere inches away from their faces, as they each took their tongues out and lapped up the liquid. Laura stood up and admired the situation. They both looked like they were feeding, just like the piggy on her shirt.

"So, what's the verdict?" she asked.

After some tasting, Rhane looked up at Laura. She tried to say something but a fiery burp came out. Laura giggled.

"It's.... it's pretty good!" Rhane said, "This even tastes better than the soda I was having! I can't believe it!"

She dove back in and dunked her face into the grease. Kitty didn't even take time to explain her opinion, as she was already slurping it up like water after a drought. Laura got thirsty again and dove in with the two girls, all three of them drinking up the contents. Their faces got coated with grease as they continued on with the dessert.

-----------------

"We'd better get back to the academy," Laura said as she carried a huge bucket out to the car, "It's 1 AM and I'm sure they'll wonder if we don't get back soon"

After about 40 minutes with the tasty grease, the girls realized the time and decided to head on out. Because they loved the grease so much, they cooked up another batch (along with some more hot dogs and burgers they happily ate) and put it into buckets to take home once it cooled down. Rhane was carrying two more buckets, plus her thermos that she dumped the coffee out of and replaced with the much tastier grease. They placed the buckets inside as Kitty locked the place from the inside, then phased outside the building and jumped into the car.

The girls weren't much heavier, only several extra pounds each, but they definitely weren't hygienic role models anymore. Laura's greasy hair laid on her shoulder, as she sucked some of the grease off her shirt. Kitty began to develop some acne and her teeth started to yellow out a bit. Rhane was farting so much that she didn't realize it half the time, and the sweat on her body was worse than it ever was. With a quick gulp from her grease thermos, she started the car as they drove back to the academy.
115321122221.title: Kitty and Rahne join her!

choices: there going to be forced to exercise
1153211222212.content: what happens at the academy
1153211222212.title: Something happens at the academy!

choices: Heads: Kitty gets Laura to exercise in her place, Kitty gains more and gets lazy
Tails: Laura gets Kitty to exercise in her place, Laura gains more and gets lazy
11532112222122.content:
BRRRRRT BRRRRT BRRRT BRRRRT

Laura extended a flabby forearm and stabbed her Alarm Clock.

"What the hell? I didn't set an alarm..." Laura groggily grumbled through clenched teeth and red eyes.

KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK

"Laura! Get up now! We need to get moving!"

'That voice...' Laura thought to herself, groggily getting her soft, greasy body up and throwing her fat legs over the side of the bed. "Was that...Logan?" Laura sleepily said to herself. She slowly heaved herself out of the bed, and with nobody watching, scratched one of her jiggly buttcheeks with an extended claw. But as she reached for the doorknob, she soon found herself grabbing a hold of a greasy roll of belly fat as Kitty had phased herself through her door...and landed with a thud on top of Laura.

"Kitty what the hell?" Laura said trying to push the flabby x-girl off of her stomach.

"Sorry Laura, I needed to hide from them. Needed to think of a plan." Kitty answered, clearly stressed and sweating.

"Hide from who? What's going on?" Laura answered, still grumpy she was woken up before 1 PM on a weekday. The door then creeked open to reveal a rather energetic-looking Rahne, who was wearing a blue and grey sports bra that barely managed to hold her assets, and made her flabby arms appear even bigger while at the same time, compressing most of her middle into a massive muffin-top that had her fat midsection spilling out over all 360 degrees of her body. Below that, solid black excercise shorts wrapped tightly around her booty which admittedly to Laura and Kitty, didn't look nearly as fat and flabby as their own when squeezed into the shorts. The shorts also emphazized her already monstrously thick thunder-thighs and flabby legs that while in no way shape or form were marathon quality, also seemed slightly more in-shape than Kitty or Laura's lard legs.

"Oh ummm...did I come at a bad time?" Rahne questioned, seeing only one flabby half-naked body from the waist down on top of another upon entering the room. Laura, quickly turning red, pushed Kitty off of her stomach to the side.

"Rahne, what's going on." Laura asked, now clearly angry.

"Oh, you didn't know? Umm...you might want to just look out the window..."

Laura and Kitty slowly crawled over to the room's window, and what they saw made their hearts sank. All of their classmates were huddled in a large group circle in running shorts and stretching.

"Logan and Xaiver thought it would be beneficial to have a daily team run every morning from now on. Team bonding and getting in shape all in one!" Rahne was clearly more excited to get her body back than the other two. "Well, I don't wanna keep you two, you guys still need to get some pants on! I'll see you down there!" Rahne left. And the remaining two girls stared at each other.

"Now what." Laura asked coldly.

"Now what?!?" Kitty nearly yelled, "We can't go down there! Remember the last time we Rahne tried to get us to excercise? It was humiliating! And that was just with the three of us! Can you imagine how awful it would be if the whole school saw how out of shape we are!" Kitty was now yelling and getting red in the face.

"Calm down...I actually have an idea..." Laura smirked, "If I leave some minor claw marks on you...we can just say that we got up EARLIER and were training right? Then we will have already had our exercise and don't need to go! And then with your phasing...maybe you could do some internal damage that we can say might take my healing factor longer than expected to repair and I need to rest all day to catch up!" Kitty shrugged,

"Ok...kind of unorthodox but I guess I don't have anything better...cut me up sister,"

"Woah there," Laura responded, "It was my idea...shouldn't I have the day off first?"

"Ummm why don't we flip a coin? I'll be heads." Kitty replied,

"Tails," Laura answered.

The coin flipped, and as it fell, both girls were planning to find a malicious way to work the system they had just created so that only one would have to exercise....
11532112222122.title: there going to be forced to exercise

115321122221221.content:
The coin flew in the air and landed on Heads. "Yes!" Kitty whooped in delight. X-23 snarled in dismay. "Best two out of three?" She asked. "No way. I won fair and square so you get to exercise in my place!" Kitty giggled happily. "Now, I think you agreed to leave some minor claw marks on me?" Laura sighed and popped her claws out. Gently, she pressed her claws against Kitty's side and slid them down. Kitty giggled as they did, leaving visible marks. "S-s-sorry! They just tickle!" She giggled as Laura looked at her in surprise at her laughing. "Guess I better go out and exercise." Laura sighed as she started to leave. "Have fun!" Kitty smiled as she watched Laura depart. Laura stuck her tongue out at Kitty, who merely smirked. A little later, Laura was jogging with Storm. Laura panted and wheezed, sweat rolling down her face and body, making her greasy and smelly. "Please *Wheeze* Ororo *Pant* can't... we... take... a *moan* break?" She pleaded, gasping, wheezing and panting in-between each word. "Alright." Storm sighed as they stopped, Laura flopping onto her belly, tongue lolling out of her mouth as she panted, clearly exhausted. For the last two hours, she had been forced to do 60 push ups, 40 sit-ups, 50 jumping jacks and now she had to jog 70 miles. Meanwhile, Kitty was happily lolling around, eating nonstop. When Laura did her push-ups, Kitty had eaten a giant hot fudge sundae with pickles. During Laura's sit-ups, Kitty had eaten a bucket of fried chicken before switching to a candy bar during Laura's jumping jacks and now was eating a whole chocolate cake as Laura finished her run. Luckily for Laura, she and Storm had finished their jog and she crawled into the mansion, dragging herself on her belly. Kitty was just finishing her cake, loudly chewing and smacking her lips, as Laura crawled into the kitchen and managed to pull herself up, using the fridge door. "Oh, hi Laura!" Kitty smiled, showing off her chocolate smeared smile. Laura merely grunted as she wiped the sweat from her face. "Pee-yew, Laura! You really reek!" Kitty remarked. "Bite... my... big... greasy.... butt." Laura wheezed as she grabbed a bottle of water, only to change her mind and grabbed a pitcher of lemonade instead. She then began gulping it down loudly, not caring that she was spilling some of it down her front. "Have fun?" Kitty asked innocently, taking a loud slurp from her large Dr. Pepper bottle.

Laura...

Doesn't say anything but glares at Kitty

Burps in Kitty's face

or

Farts in Kitty's face after sitting on her

Take your pick!

1153221.content:
You've chosen Kitty Pryde, AKA Shadowcat

Choices

She starts letting herself go

or

She begins going to a buffet

Take your pick!
1153221.title: Kitty it is!

M (the soiled princes... I mean spoiled princess)
13.content: So you're going with the investigation team of X-Factor. Who on the team will you choose?
13.title: X-Factor

choices: Rahne packed snacks, maybe too many snacks.
131.content:
Rahne Sinclair let loose a drawn out, deep belch as she sat herself into the crater imprint left onto the couch from all the hours she spent sitting there. With a small whimper, the Scot moved her hand to snatch another pint of ice cream, this one being, "Chocolate fudge supreme explosion". She pulled off the lid from the dessert, and scooped up a chunk of the ice cream, shoving it into her stained lips. Frowning, she dropped the spoon onto her side, lifting the pint to her lips, tilting her head back she let the ice cream flow into her maw, letting the chocolate slop enter and add onto her girth she developed.

          Ever since the death of her son, the redhead was stuck in depression, a horrible case that is, but attempting to overeat on ice cream didn't work, until she started binging on other fatty woods to "cure" herself, sporting a new belly in the next few weeks. Growing and growing as Rahne indulged and stuffed herself, leading to her current state on the couch.

          With a grunt, Rahne lowered the pint and belched again, huffing slightly as she brought a hand to her the pudgy gut that grown in the middle, small droplets of ice cream on the orb, shifting her body to the side, the redhead grunted as a small fart escaped her ass. “God bless, ice cream..”

          “What died in here?” Theresa Cassidy, Siryn, stepped into the room, her fingers pinning her nostrils shot as she scanned the room, the obvious answer being her teammate, chugging down ice cream and letting it flow on to the rest of her.

          “She's getting bad, y'know." Theresa spoke, stirring a spoon into her coffee. “And you think I care?” Monet responded, giving the redhead a sigh, biting into some buttered toast.

          “Well, she's our teammate! And you know.... depressed.” Siryn whispered out the last part, putting her spoon to the side and taking a long sip from her coffee.

          “Well, do you think we're going to solve miss ice cream's problems over there?” She stared down at her toast, and then at a smiling redhead. Monet brought her head down and sighed, “Alright, go call Lorna why don't you?”

          Theresa brought her hands together and clapped, jumping out of her seat and running towards the hall, leaving Monet alone to eat her breakfast. “I live with a bunch of morons.” She sighed, biting into her toast. “Ye goin' to finish that?” Rahne asked, staring down Theresa's coffee cup.

          Another quick sigh was release, “Knock yourself out.” And Rahne grabbed the cup, chugging down the coffee as she walked away. Monet dropping her head as she heard a burp come from the petite woman.

          “Alright, ladies, it's just us girls. So you know what that means? Road trip, bitches!!” Lorna raised her hands up, the green haired beauty spinning in her outfit.“And you're here to enjoy it, fatass.” She slid up her sunglasses as a finger pressed into the soft middle of Rahne's gut.

          This could not end well.
131.title: The entire team

choices: Other (if you can think of any)
15.title: Other

info.brief_description: The women of the X-Men franchise go through slobby transformations.
info.description:
The female characters from the X-Men comics (including X-Force, X-Factor, and all other related series) go through slob transformations. Such as getting fat, smelly, gassy, losing IQ points, and more. Pick your character or characters or teams and have fun.

-Please choose adult characters
-Female and Male characters can be used
-Please don't let a storyline end unless you leave options for people to continue it in the chapter before it
